content: Just unpacked my last box in NYC and stumbled upon a Japanese calligraphy set I forgot I had. Might be time to find some zen in this urban jungle. 🗾🌆
raw_content: "Just unpacked my last box in NYC and found a Japanese calligraphy set I forgot I bought. Guess it's time to channel my inner zen amidst the urban chaos! 🗾🌆 #NYC #JapanToNYC"
